video

GDR3 - Acceleration of the solar system

This visualisation illustrates the aberration effect measured by Gaia in 3000 distant quasars. The motion is activated running 25,000 trillion times faster than in reality. The quasars appear to move closer towards the direction of acceleration, close to the galactic centre.

poster

3D structure of Galactic Molecular Clouds

Augmented reality view of selected clouds constructed from the analysis of Gaia data

IoW

story

Gaia's multi-dimensional Milky Way

Several Gaia Collaboration sky maps: stellar motion, stellar ages, brightness, variable stars, stellar extinction, interstellar medium, radial velocities, chemical composition, stellar motion.
